items.desc: <tftitemrules>Tons of EVERYTHING!</tftitemrules>

items.desc:
Combat start: The holder and allies within @HexRange@ hexes in the same row gain a @ShieldValue@ Shield, @BonusResists@ Armor, and @BonusResists@ Magic Resist for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Locket of the Iron Solari

items.desc: After casting an Ability, gain @AttackSpeedToGive@% Attack Speed for @ASDuration@ seconds.

Once per combat at @PercentHealthTrigger@% Health, the holder splits into 3 copies of themself each with @PercentHealthOfCopies@% of their max Health.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]

items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities deal @BurnPercent@% Burn and @GrievousWoundsPercent@% Wound to enemies for @BurnDuration@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received
items.name: Morellonomicon

items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities @BurnPercent@% Burn and @HealingReductionPct@% Wound enemies for @Duration@ seconds.

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
Wound: Reduces healing received

Combat start: Gain a @ShieldSize@% max Health Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
When the shield expires, gain @ShieldBonusAP@ Ability Power.

items.desc: %i:scaleAD% +@AD*100@% Attack Damage
items.name: B.F. Sword

items.desc:
Shrinks the holder, granting them increased movement speed and immunity to Chill.

Chill: reduce Attack Speed
items.name: Mittens

items.desc:
Combat start: Gain different bonuses based on starting position.

Front Two Rows: @FrontRowBonusResists@ Armor and Magic Resist. Gain @FrontLineManaPerHit@ Mana when struck by an attack.

Back Two Rows: @BackRowBonusAP@ Ability Power. Gain @ManaPerTickrate@ Mana every @ManaTickrate@ seconds.
items.name: Adaptive Helm

items.desc:
Combat start: Blast the current target for @PercentMaxHealthDamage*100@% of their max Health as magic damage.

For the next @Duration@ seconds, gain @BaseDamageAmp*100@% Damage Amp. Against the blasted target this is increased to @TargetDamageAmp*100@%.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Deathfire Grasp

items.desc:
Combat start: The holder and all adjacent allies gain @ADIncrease*100@ Attack Damage and @APIncrease@ Ability Power.

When the holder dies, Stun all enemies within 2-hexes for @Duration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Spite

items.desc:
Max mana reduced by @ManaReduction@.

When the holder gets a takedown, they deal @DamageAmp*100@% more damage for @TakedownTimer@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Blue Buff

items.desc:
Attacks deal an additional @PercentDamage@% Attack Damage %i:scaleAD% as physical damage and heal the holder for the damage dealt.

The holder cannot cast their Ability or gain Mana.
items.name: Corrupt Vampiric Scepter

items.desc:
Physical damage @ArmorReductionPercent@% Sunders the target for @ArmorBreakDuration@ seconds. This effect does not stack.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
Sunder: Reduce Armor
items.name: Last Whisper

items.desc:
Abilities can critically strike.

If the holder's abilities can already critically strike, gain @CritDamageToGive*100@% Critical Strike Damage instead.
items.name: Jeweled Gauntlet

items.desc: %i:scaleHealth% +@Health@ Health
items.name: Giant's Belt

items.desc: Print the UnitID to chat.
items.name: Do You Know Who I Am?
items.en_name: Do You Know Who I Am?

items.desc:
Attacks deal @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Item_Artifact_WitsEnd_Damage@ bonus magic damage.

Heals the holder for @PercentHealing@% of all magic damage dealt.

Damage increases based on Stage.
items.name: Wit's End

items.desc: %i:scaleAP% +@AP@ Ability Power
items.name: Needlessly Large Rod

items.desc: Stunning an enemy causes lightning to strike them, dealing @PercentHealthDamage@% of their max Health as magic damage.
items.name: Horizon Focus

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant %i:scaleArmor% @BonusDefense@ Armor and %i:scaleMR% @BonusDefense@ Magic Resistance to the holder and adjacent allies.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Randuin's Omen

items.desc: Gain @BaseDurability*100@% Durability. While above @ThresholdForEmpower*100@% Health, instead gain @EmpoweredDurability*100@% Durability.
items.name: Steadfast Heart

items.desc: After killing a target, shed negative effects and dash to the farthest target within @HexRange@ hexes. The next 2 critical attacks deal @CritDamageBonusPercent@% bonus Critical Strike Damage.
items.name: Prowler's Claw

items.desc:
Every @ShieldRate@ seconds, grant a @BaseShieldAmount@-@MaxShield@ Shield (based on Stage) to the @ShieldTargets@ lowest percent health allies for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Moonstone Renewer

items.desc: Your team gains +@MaxArmySizeIncrease@ max team size.
items.name: Tactician's Crown

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant @ASBuff@% Attack Speed and @BonusResists@ Armor and Magic Resist to the holder, adjacent allies in the same row, and all allies behind them for @BuffDuration@ seconds.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Aegis of the Legion

items.desc:
Combat start: Gain immunity to crowd control for @SpellShieldDuration@ seconds. During this time, gain @ProcAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed every @ProcInterval@ seconds.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Quicksilver

items.desc:
Combat start: Grant @ChaliceAP@ Ability Power and @BonusInitialMana@ Mana to the holder and allies within 2 hexes in the same row.

​​[Support item]
items.name: Chalice of Power

items.desc:
Grants immunity to Stuns and the holder's attacks Stun the target for @StunDuration@ seconds.

The holder's Attack Speed is locked at @AttackSpeedCap@.
items.name: Silvermere Dawn

items.desc:
Each round: Equip 2 random Support items.

[Consumes 3 item slots.]
items.name: Accomplice's Gloves

items.desc: Gain @BonusPercentHP*100@% max health.
items.name: Warmog's Armor

items.desc: Takedowns increase the holder's Armor, Magic Resist, and Ability Power by @StatsPerTakedown@, increased to @StatsPerKill@ if they score the kill.
items.name: Seeker's Armguard

items.desc:
Every 3rd attack deals @Damage@ magic damage and @MRShred@% Shreds @1StarBounces@ enemies for @MRShredDuration@ seconds.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
items.name: Statikk Shiv

items.desc:
Attacks and Abilities execute enemies below @ExecutePercent@% of their maximum Health. Executions have a @GoldChance@% chance to drop %i:goldCoins% 1 gold.

[Unique - only 1 per champion]
items.name: Gold Collector

items.desc: This slot can't hold an item.
items.name: Unusable Slot

items.desc:
Heal the lowest percent Health ally for @AllyHealing*100@% of damage dealt.

Ally Healing: @TFTUnitProperty.item:TFT_Tracker_Value1@
items.name: Hextech Gunblade

ability.desc: The Voidspawn gains bonus Health and Attack Damage based on the current Stage.
ability.name: Voidborn

ability.desc: The Training Dummy cannot move or attack. It is also dressed like a devilishly handsome Yordle.

ability.desc: Drag this Tome to the Shop to open an Armory full of emblems! You will have 30 seconds to choose.

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Artifact items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.

ability.desc: Drag this to the Shop to open an Armory full of Support items! You will have 30 seconds to choose.
ability.name: Support item anvil

ability.desc: This chest stores all of the accumulated loot you've collected. Win a combat against a player to open it!
ability.name: Mercenary Chest

ability.desc: Slam the target dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Golem Smash

ability.desc: Passive: Heal to full Health whenever an allied Krug dies.
ability.name: Stone Salvage

ability.desc: Passive: Leap to the enemy backline at the beginning of combat.
ability.name: Pack Attack

ability.desc: Passive: Leap to the enemy backline at the beginning of combat.
ability.name: Pack Attack

ability.desc: Passive: Gain Attack Speed whenever an allied Razorbeak dies.
ability.name: Furious Flock

ability.desc: Passive: Gain Attack Speed whenever an allied Razorbeak dies.
ability.name: Furious Flock

ability.desc: Combat start: Charge forward, dealing <magicDamage>@MaxHealthPct*100@%</magicDamage> max Health magic damage and stunning enemies.
ability.name: Void Charge

ability.desc: Passive: Attacks splash in a cone behind the target.
ability.name: Primordial Breath

ability.desc: Place a bomb on the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedInitialDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and <TFTKeyword>Stunning</TFTKeyword> them for @StunDuration@ seconds. When the stun ends or the target dies, the bomb explodes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedSecondaryDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Time Bomb

ability.desc:
Fire a shard of ice at the target that pierces through enemies hit, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage, reduced by @FalloffDamage*100@% for each enemy hit. Targets are Sundered for @SunderDuration@ seconds.

Sunder: Reduce Armor
ability.name: Ice Shard

ability.desc:
Passive: Permanently gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_WarwickASAmountToGain@% Attack Speed and movement speed for each champion killed. Attacks heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) Health and deal @BonusOnAttackDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage. Gain double the healing and physical damage for targets below @HealthThreshold*100@% Health.

(Current Bonus: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_WarwickBonusAS@% Attack Speed and movement speed)
ability.name: Ravenous Hunter

ability.desc: Paint a lightning bolt on the target. A moment later the bolt strikes, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedBoltDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and <magicDamage>@ModifiedAreaDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies. Every 3rd cast, paint @NumExtraBolts@ extra bolts on the lowest percent Health enemies.
ability.name: Subject: Storm

ability.desc:
Dash within @DashRangeInHexes@ hexes to hit the most enemies possible and heal for @ModifiedBonusSnowHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%). Excess healing becomes a @ShieldDuration@ second Shield. Then, deal @ModifiedInnerRingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to adjacent enemies and @ModifiedOuterRingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to enemies @SpellRadiusInHexes@ hexes away.

Every @SnowfallCasts@ casts create a snowfall that Chills all enemies and heals all allies for @ModifiedSnowHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%) over @HealDuration@ seconds. Excess healing also becomes a @ShieldDuration@ second Shield.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%
ability.name: Snowfall

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies and gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedBonusResists@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Armor and Magic Resist for @Duration@ seconds. During this time, attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedBonusDamage@ (%i:scaleArmor% %i:scaleMR%)</magicDamage> bonus magic damage.
ability.name: Grandmaster-At-Arms

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds, increased by @ShieldInc*100@% for each enemy targeting Vex. When it expires, deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedBaseDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies within 2 hexes.
ability.name: Personal Space

ability.desc:
Passive: Fly around and attack the nearest enemy.

Active: Gain @BonusAttackSpeed*100@% Attack Speed and replace Smolder's attacks with fireballs that deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage for @SpellDuration@ seconds.

Dragon Upgrade: Each fireball also heals @Heal@ Health.
ability.name: Learning to Fly

ability.desc: Attach a temporal rift to the target and the closest unaffected enemy that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over @RiftDuration@ seconds. Reset the duration of all other rifts on the enemy.
ability.name: Borrowed Time

ability.desc:
Passive: On target death, hookshot to the lowest percent health enemy within @HookshotHexRange@ hexes and deal @IsolationZoneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. After a hookshot or Ability cast, the next attack deals @TrueDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) true damage.

Active: Knock back and Stun enemies adjacent to the target for @StunDuration@ seconds, dealing @IsolationZoneDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage. Create a containment zone around the target for @IsolationDuration@ seconds. Gain @ZoneDamageReduction*100@% Durability and @ZoneBonusAD*100@% Attack Damage while in the zone.
ability.name: Temporal Anomaly

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Honey Barrier

ability.desc:
Transform into a spider, replace this Ability with Petrifying Venom, then cast it.

Petrifying Venom: Stun the target for @StunDuration@ seconds and deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to them. Heal for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%).
ability.name: Spider Form

ability.desc:
Transform into hammer form and gain @ModifiedResistGain@ (%i:scaleAP%) Armor and Magic Resist. Replace this Ability with Hammer Slam and immediately cast it.

Hammer Slam: Leap to the target, dealing @Damage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.
ability.name: Hammer Form

ability.desc: Fire a cannonball at the target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the first enemy hit. That enemy is knocked back <scaleLevel>@HexKnockback@</scaleLevel> hexes and <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword> if they are within 2 hexes of Tristana.
ability.name: Explosive Charge

ability.desc: For the next <TFTBonus>@TotalDuration@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> seconds, Ashe fires an extra missile dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage at a target near Ashe. This effect stacks.
ability.name: Dark Tidings

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and reduce their Magic Resist by <scaleLevel>@MRShred@</scaleLevel> for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Trouble Bottle

ability.desc:
Passive: Shields grant @OnShieldAS*100@% Attack Speed for @ASDuration@ seconds.

Active: Dash up to @DashHexRange@ hexes away, then deal @ModifiedStrikeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a line through the target. Gain @ModifiedShield@ (%i:scaleAP%) Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Formless Blade

ability.desc: Deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedStabDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to the target and gain <TFTBonus>@ShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds. For the rest of combat, attacks deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedStackingDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> bonus stacking magic damage.
ability.name: Nether Blade

ability.desc: Launches a honey wad through the current target, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedPhysicalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage>  physical damage to enemies hit. Adjacent allies and allies hit by the trail are set abuzz, gaining <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Attack Speed for @Duration@ seconds.
ability.name: Hive Ooze

ability.desc: For the next @Duration@ seconds, attacks instead deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
ability.name: Witch Fang

ability.desc:
Conjure a rift on the target that deals @ModifiedPrimaryTargetDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and @ShredPercent@% Shreds for @ShredDuration@ seconds. This ability upgrades the more it is cast. (Total Casts: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_TimesCast@ casts)

@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade1@ Casts: Enemies adjacent to the target are Shredded and take @ModifiedAOEDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.
@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade2@+ Casts: For every @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_Syndra_CastUpgrade2@ casts, create an additional rift on a nearby enemy that deals @ExtraOrbDamageModifier*100@% damage.

Shred: Reduce Magic Resist
ability.name: Transcendence

ability.desc:
Bite the target, healing for @ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%), dealing @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage, and Chilling them for @ChillDuration@ seconds.

Chill: Reduce Attack Speed by 20%
ability.name: Sticky Bite

ability.desc:
Blink to the largest group of enemies within @BlinkHexRange@ hexes and spin, dealing @TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage over @Duration@ seconds to enemies within @DamageHexRange@ hexes and Wounding them for @WoundDuration@ seconds. The @BonusEnemyCount@ nearest enemies take @ModifiedAdditionalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage instead.

If Katarina kills an enemy, she blinks to reposition again.

Wound: Reduce healing received by 33%
ability.name: Death Lotus

ability.desc:
Passive: On takedown of the current target, if Hecarim's next target is out of range, charge to them, dealing @ModifiedChargeDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Active: For the next @CleaveDuration@ seconds, attacks also cleave adjacent enemies for @TotalCleaveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.
ability.name: Rampage

ability.desc: Transform into a Crab for @Duration@ seconds. Over the duration, regain <scaleHealth>@HealthRegainPct@% (%i:scaleHealth%)</scaleHealth> health and release scuttleblasts at @NumAllies@ nearby allies and @NumEnemies@ nearby enemies. Allies hit are healed for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>; enemies hit take <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage and are <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword> for @StunDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Surprise!!!

ability.desc: Dash to the ideal spot within @MaxDashDistanceHexes@ hexes. Then, fire a blast in a line, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> damage reduced by @ReducedDamagePercent*100@% for each enemy hit.
ability.name: Portalshot Barrage

ability.desc: For @Duration@ seconds, gain <TFTBonus>@AttackSpeed*100@%</TFTBonus> decaying Attack Speed and her attacks deal <trueDamage>@BonusDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</trueDamage> bonus true damage. Takedowns refresh this effect for @ResetDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Get Excited!

ability.desc:
Passive: Gain @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_VeigarAbilityPowerGainPerZap@ Ability Power for every Charm you buy. (Charms Bought: @TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_VeigarZapsPurchased@)

Active: Deal @ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage to the target.
ability.name: King Bee's Judgement

ability.desc: Launch a magic missile at the target that bounces @NumEnemies@ times between enemies dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies hit. They also take <scaleLevel>@DamageIncPct@%</scaleLevel> more damage for @DamageIncDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Traveling Whimsy

ability.desc: Heal for <scaleHealth>@ModifiedHeal@ (%i:scaleAP%)</scaleHealth>, then deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to adjacent enemies.
ability.name: Dream Bloom

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield that decays over @ShieldDuration@ seconds and slam the target, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedSlamDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage in a 2-hex line. Gain <scaleLevel>@PassiveAP@</scaleLevel> Ability Power for the rest of combat.
ability.name: Obliterate

ability.desc: Leap backward and briefly gain <scaleLevel>@DamageReductionPct@%</scaleLevel> Durability. Then, sweep through the most enemies possible within @HexRange@ hexes, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalBaseDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to each one, plus <physicalDamage>@TotalSplitDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> split between all enemies hit.
ability.name: Dance of Blades

ability.desc:
Passive: Every @CastsPerStack@ casts, Gwen gains a Snip! stack.

Active: Dash and snip twice plus once for every Snip! stack in a cone. The first and last snip each deal @SnipDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage and other snips each deal @SmallSnipDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%).
ability.name: Snip Snip!

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleHealth%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and shoot @NumFeathers@ feathers in a wide cone, dealing <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies they hit. Then land, granting allies within 2 hexes a <TFTBonus>@ModifiedAllyShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> Shield for @AllyShieldDuration@ seconds.
ability.name: Gleaming Quill

ability.desc: Dive underground and surface next to the closest enemy. Send out a shockwave towards the farthest enemy within @ShockwaveTargetingRangeInHexes@ hexes. Enemies within 2 hexes or hit by the shockwave take <magicDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%%i:scaleHealth%)</magicDamage> magic damage and are <TFTKeyword>Stunned</TFTKeyword> for <scaleLevel>@StunDuration@</scaleLevel> seconds.
ability.name: Divination Dive

ability.desc:
Passive: Attacks embed a spear in her target. Every @SpearPeriod@ attacks, also embed spears into @NumBolts@ nearby enemies.

Active: Deal @SpearDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage to each enemy for each of their embedded spears.
ability.name: Rend

ability.desc: Open portals that fire <TFTBonus>@ModifiedNumMissiles@ (%i:scaleAS%)</TFTBonus> magic bolts split among the @NumTargets@ closest enemies. Each bolt deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage.
ability.name: Runic Portal

ability.desc: Fire a bubble that deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedBubbleDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage at the largest group of enemies within range. Every 3rd cast, summon The Leviathan instead, which <TFTKeyword>Stuns</TFTKeyword> and deals <magicDamage>@ModifiedLeviathanDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage to enemies in a line.
ability.name: Leviathan

ability.desc:
Leap to the largest group of enemies, dealing @LeapDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage to enemies in a @LeapStunHexRadius@-hex radius and Stun them for @LeapStunDuration@ seconds. Then, enter a frenzy, gaining @ModifiedFrenzyAttackSpeed@ (%i:scaleAP%) Attack Speed, @FrenzyOmnivamp*100@% Omnivamp, and causing attacks to deal @FrenzyCleaveDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) bonus physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies.

If already frenzied, empower the next attack to chomp, dealing @ModifiedBiteDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%) physical damage.

(Bonus Health: +@TFTUnitProperty.:TFT12_BriarHealthFed@ Health)
ability.name: Certain Death

ability.desc: Gain <TFTBonus>@ModifiedShieldAmount@ (%i:scaleAP%)</TFTBonus> shield for @ShieldDuration@ seconds and summon a swarm of @NumberOfBats@ bats. They seek out the @NumTargets@ closest enemies within 3 hexes and deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedMagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage each. Bats deal true damage to enemies below @EnemyPercentHealthThreshold*100@% Health.
ability.name: My Lovely Pets

ability.desc: Launch @NumberOfBlasts@ arcane blasts at random enemies that each deal <magicDamage>@ModifiedDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> damage.
ability.name: Eye of the Magus

ability.desc:
Throw @NumItems@ completed items to allies with open slots. If an ally has no room for items, they instead gain a stacking @DamageMod*100@% Damage Amp for the rest of combat. Then, throw @NumEnemies@ knick-knacks at enemies that each deal @MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%) magic damage.

Occasionally, also finds something special in the backpack.
ability.name: Knick-Knack Attack

ability.desc: Launch a ball at the current target that explodes for <magicDamage>@MagicDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage, and colors the area for @DOTDuration@ seconds, dealing <magicDamage>@DOTDamage@ (%i:scaleAP%)</magicDamage> magic damage over the duration. If the ball lands in an area that is already colored, it will bounce to a new location within 2-hexes before exploding.
ability.name: Portalpalooza

ability.desc:
Sneeze fire at the target, dealing @SpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.

Dragon Upgrade: Instead sneeze dragonfire in a larger area. Dragonfire deals @UpgradeSpellDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%) physical damage.
ability.name: Fiery Sneeze

ability.desc: Fire a supernova at the largest clump of enemies within Attack Range plus 1 hexes that deals <physicalDamage>@TotalDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target and adjacent enemies. It explodes into a cluster of fireballs, each dealing <physicalDamage>@ClusterDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> physical damage.
ability.name: Hail of Hellfire

ability.desc: Steal <scaleLevel>@FlatHealthSteal@</scaleLevel> Health split between the nearest @NumEnemies@ enemies. Each cast after heals <scaleHealth>@ModifiedAttackHealAmount@</scaleHealth> (%i:scaleAP%) Health and deals <physicalDamage>@EmpoweredDamage@ (%i:scaleHealth%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to the target instead.
ability.name: Hellhound

ability.desc: Dash to the farthest enemy within @DashHexRange@ hexes, dealing <physicalDamage>@ModifiedDashDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%)</physicalDamage> physical damage to them. The next @NumAttacks@ attacks launch kunai at the target, dealing <physicalDamage>@TotalAutoDamage@ (%i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%)</physicalDamage> damage.
ability.name: Fire Point Strike

ability.desc: Gain <scaleLevel>@ModifiedDamageReduction@</scaleLevel> (%i:scaleAP%) Durability for @Duration@ seconds and attract nearby enemy projectiles. (@MinUnits@) AND Chronos gain @BonusAS*100@% %i:scaleAS% and your team heals @TimeHeal*100@% Health instead

traits.desc:
Your team gains @TeamwideAP@ %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

When Incantors attack or cast, all Incantors gain stacks of %i:scaleAP% up to @MaxStacks@. Every other attack grants @StacksPerAttack@ stack, and each Ability cast grants @StacksPerCast@ stacks.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusAPPerStack@ %i:scaleAP% per stack
(@MinUnits@) @BonusAPPerStack@ %i:scaleAP% per stack; your team gains @TeamwideAP@ %i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Incantor

traits.desc:
(1) Ascendant Charms can appear in your shop. The odds increase by @PercentageChancePerPlayerCombat@% after player combat, up to @MaxPercentageChance@%. When you buy one, the odds reset.

Current Odds: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_AscendantOdds@%
traits.name: Ascendant

traits.desc:
Faeries gain %i:scaleHealth% Health and create special items that become stronger with trait tiers.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Gain Queen's Crown that grants @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA% Damage Amp
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Gain Queenguard's Armor
(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%, Crown @DamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%, Both items become Radiant

Only Faeries can hold Faerie items.

traits.desc: After combat, Milio has a 40/60/100% chance to convert a temporary relic component into a real component.

traits.desc:
Your team heals for a percent of their max %i:scaleHealth% Health every @Duration@ seconds. If they're full Health, restore %i:scaleMana% Mana instead.

Preservers gain double the amount.


(@MinUnits@) @HealthPct*100@% %i:scaleHealth% or @ManaPct*100@% %i:scaleMana%
traits.name: Preserver

traits.desc:
Vanguards gain @DamageReductionPct*100@% %i:scaleDR% Durability while Shielded.

Combat start and at @HealthThreshold*100@% Health: Gain a Shield for a percent of max Health for @ShieldDuration@ seconds.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldPercentAmount*100@% max Health
traits.name: Vanguard

traits.desc:
When your team loses @HealthRatio*100@% of their Health, an Old God awakens. It gains @PercentHealthPerStarLevel*100@% Health and @APPerStarLevel*100@% Ability Power for each Eldritch star level.

(@MinUnits@) The Tainted Golem
(@MinUnits@) The Dark Monolith
(@MinUnits@) The Many-Eyed Beast
(@MinUnits@) The Stormbringer
traits.name: Eldritch

traits.desc:

(@MinUnits@) @BonusHealthRatio*100@% %i:scaleHealth%
traits.name: Shapeshifter

traits.desc:

(@MinUnits@) @BaseDamageAmp*100@% %i:scaleDA%; @DamageAmpAfterCasting*100@% during burst
traits.name: Blaster

traits.desc:
Your team gains %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% @TeamwideResists@ Armor and Magic Resist.

Bastions gain more, and the value doubles in the first @Duration@ seconds of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR%
(@MinUnits@) @BonusArmor@ %i:scaleArmor%%i:scaleMR% and @NumUnits@ champions starting combat in the back 2 rows are invulnerable until 4 Bastions die
traits.name: Bastion

traits.desc: Briar gains %i:scaleDA% @TOOLTIPDamageAmpPerHealth*100@% Damage Amp for each player health you are missing. Each round, gain a Light Snack to give her <scaleHealth>@BriarHealthGain@ %i:scaleHealth%</scaleHealth> in exchange for @TacticianHealthToFeed@ of your player health.

traits.desc:
(@MinUnits@) Dragon attacks and Abilities @BurnPercent@% Burn and Wound enemies for @BurnWoundDuration@ seconds.
(@MinUnits@) The power of friendship upgrades all dragon Abilities!

Burn: Deals a percent of the target's max Health as true damage every second
traits.name: Dragon

traits.desc:
Honeymancers gain Bees that deal magic damage to their target every @Period@ seconds. Each Bee deals @BonusDamage*100@% of the Honeymancer's damage dealt and @DamageReceived*100@% of their damage taken.

When a Honeymancer dies, leave 1 Bee that follows nearby Honeymancers for the rest of combat.

(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees
(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees
(@MinUnits@) @MiniCount@ Bees, @NumTransfers@ Bees survive instead
traits.name: Honeymancy

traits.desc:

Objects from other dimensions fly out of a portal every few seconds to help allies and disrupt enemies. The portal becomes @IncreasePerStarLevel*100@% stronger for each Portal champion's star level.

(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Small portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Medium portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, Large portal
(@MinUnits@) @ShieldAmount@ Shield, GIGA portal

Mages cast their Abilities twice and have modified total %i:scaleAP% Ability Power.

(@MinUnits@) @APMultiplier*100@% %i:scaleAP%
traits.name: Mage

traits.desc:
Sugarcrafters build a layer cake from sugar. Gain sugar for each component your champions are holding after player combat.

They gain %i:scaleAD% Attack Damage and %i:scaleAP% Ability Power, increased by @BonusRatio*100@% for each cake layer. When the cake has reached @MaxLayers@ layers, gain treats instead!

(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
(@MinUnits@) @SugarMultiplier@ sugar, @BaseAPAD@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%, team gains @BonusHealth@ %i:scaleHealth%

Total: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_BonusStats@ %i:scaleAD%%i:scaleAP%
Layers: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_NumLayers@ / @MaxLayers@
Sugar per round: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_SugarToAdd@ = @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TotalComponents@ components x @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_Pastry_TraitSugarMult@ from trait
traits.name: Sugarcraft

traits.desc:
Your team gains @BaseASPct@% %i:scaleAS% Attack Speed. Pyro champions gain more %i:scaleAS% and execute enemies under @ExecutePct@% Health.

For each kill, Pyro champions create an infernal cinder that you collect the next round. For every @NumCinders@ cinders you collect, your team gains @ASPctPerNumCinders@% more %i:scaleAS%.

(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS%
(@MinUnits@) @PyroUnitAS@% %i:scaleAS% and execute under @ExecutePct@% Health

Team %i:scaleAS%: @TFTUnitProperty.trait:TFT12_PyroAttackSpeed@%

zaps.name: Paragon
